lines.text: I was on the same plane as you. I couldn't help but notice how attractive you are. You know you have a very beautiful mouth?
Yeah, so do you, but it's big. You go away, lady, or I'll call a cop.
Well, then kiss me, I'm crazy about cops.

You listen. I just hope you pick the right team today, Stu, because if I don't get that 28 G's in my pocket before sundown, you're going to take another trip out the window. And next time, nobody holds the ankles. You got it?
Dirty shoes and clean white hands.
A lot of guys have clean hands.
But not that clean. It must have taken you ten years at least to get them that clean.
What are you, a commercial or what?
He's a hell of a charmer. Just make sure his hair doesn't fall in your drink.
